General.Name: Hanwha General
General.Description: Hanwha General Insurance Co., Ltd. provides insurance services in South Korea. It offers long-term insurance, such as injury, diseases, property damage, liability, and annuity; automobile insurance products comprising casualty and property; and fire insurance products, as well as retirement pension products. The company was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Hanwha General Insurance Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Hanwha Life Insurance Co., Ltd.
